--- Airshadow <airly2002@...> wrote:

> In a corder Nightstrike looked the new comers with a mix of distrust
> and surprice.

OOC: This takes place just as Cyclonus and Scourge Vorpal's chambers,
and before they took off to earth.

Vorpal sat on his throne, his thoughts dark and moody. The shadows of
the room covered him like a cloak, his optics glowing ereeilly from the
darkness. His thoughts churned, .oO(Who was this Cyclonus? And what
exactly was a Herald of Unicron? and most importantly why was he
here?!) Vorpal's hand clenched against the arm of his throne causing it
to groan and creak, although he paid it little heed as his thoughts
continued. .oO(He says he is here to serve me, but has he come to take
my place? Have I failed Unicron?) 

A creak and then a crack broke his concentration as his armrest broke
under strain his his clenched fist. His optic scanned the room, as if
for the first time remembering that there were others in the room. 

He looked at Nightstrike. "Go!" he said, in commanding tones. "Go with
this Cyclonus and his sweeps. Help them, aid them in the name of
Unicron." He paused slightly as his optics turned decidedly dark and
dangerous. "But if he does ANYTHING that is not in line with Unicron's
command or objectives, you will let me know immediatly!"

 
Preston
(NPC - Vorpal)
